h2_title: Violet Spider Boss Fight and Guide
content: Luckily, these strands all count as projectiles that can be deflected, meaning you need only stand your ground and spin your staff to knock each webbing projectile away as it comes, letting you evade both getting stuck and taking damage all at once.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Violet_Spider.md', within the main section titled 'Violet Spider', specifically from the subsection 'Violet Spider Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Luckily, these strands all count as projectiles that can be deflected, meaning you need only stand your ground and spin your staff to knock each webbing projectile away as it comes, letting you evade both getting stuck and taking damage all at once.
